long_description: Lightweight core warmth and waterproof, windproof and breathable protection come together in the men's Helly Hansen Crew Vest. Add some style to your hikes and trail runs. Helly Tech(R) Protection 2-ply fabric construction is fully seam sealed and gives you everyday protection in moderate weather. Durable water repellent finish beads up light rain so it runs off. Quick-drying mesh lining enhances comfort. Zippered hand pockets and a single chest pocket. Helly Hansen Crew Vest for men features an adjustable hem so you can seal weather out, warmth in.
short_description: Lightweight core warmth and waterproof, windproof and breathable protection come together in the men's Helly Hansen Crew Vest. Add some style to your hikes and trail runs.
